abstract: A music item that represents an artist.

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/MusicKit/Artist

# Artist

**Structure**

A music item that represents an artist.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Artist
```

## Instance Properties

- **albums**: The artist’s associated albums.
- **appearsOnAlbums**: A collection of albums from other artists that this artist appears on.
- **artwork**: The artist artwork.
- **compilationAlbums**: A collection of compilation albums that include tracks by the artist.
- **editorialNotes**: The notes about the artist that appear in the Music catalog.
- **featuredAlbums**: A collection of featured albums of the artist.
- **featuredPlaylists**: A collection of the artist’s associated playlists.
- **fullAlbums**: A collection of the artist’s full-release albums.
- **genreNames**: The names of this artist’s associated genres.
- **genres**: The artist’s associated genres.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the artist.
- **latestRelease**: The artist’s most recent album.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the artist to the library.
- **liveAlbums**: A collection of the artist’s live albums.
- **musicVideos**: The artist’s associated music videos.
- **name**: The name of the artist.
- **playlists**: The artist’s associated playlists.
- **similarArtists**: A collection of artists similar to this artist.
- **singles**: A collection of the artist’s associated albums in the *singles* category.
- **station**: The artist’s associated station.
- **topMusicVideos**: A collection of the artist’s top music videos.
- **topSongs**: A collection of the artist’s top songs.
- **url**: The URL for the artist.

## Default Implementations

- **FilterableMusicItem Implementations**
- **MusicLibraryRequestable Implementations**

## Music Items

- **Album**: A music item that represents an album.
- **Curator**: A music item that represents a curator.
- **Genre**: A music item that represents a genre.
- **MusicVideo**: A music item that represents a music video.
- **Playlist**: A music item that represents a playlist.
- **RadioShow**: A music item that represents a radio show.
- **RecordLabel**: A music item that represents a record label.
- **Song**: A music item that represents a song.
- **Station**: A music item that represents a station.
- **Track**: A music item that represents a track.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- FilterableMusicItem
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicCatalogSearchable
- MusicItem
- MusicLibraryRequestable
- MusicLibrarySearchable
- MusicLibrarySectionRequestable
- MusicPropertyContainer
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
